channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox in backyard in Ancona road plumstead Se18 1AF, 1st August
item.description:
Yesterday i was looking for my cat and i smelled a really strong dead smell so i look at the back of my yard i saw dead fox. My neighbour realised that too. Basically after our garden theres a small council spaces and all our neighbours have same. But it was too late for me to jump and clean that so i wanted to report this on behalf of my community. Council has the key to go backspace and luckily my mom has built door to have access. Can you please help me out on this.Thank you so much

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Pleasant Place, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Engine Idling linked to ref: 7965791., 1st August
item.description:
Hi, Can you look and investigate the report of a TFL white van engine idling outside the baker street underground station. They left the engine on for 30 minutes, omitting pollution into the environment and affecting the public around them, especially waiting at the bus stop. Also, causing noise disruption to those in the area. Please assist with this report. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Hanover Terrace, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
